survey.introduction: We're conducting an opinion survey today among people between the ages of 18 and 60 about various products used in the household and I'd like to ask you a few questions.

questions.question: First of all, are you between the ages of 18 and 60?
And are you between 18 and 34 years of age, or between 35 and 60 years of age?
Do you currently smoke at least 3 packs of cigarettes a week?
Do you usually smoke the regular/king size cigarettes or the cigarettes that are longer than king size -- that is, the 100 or 120 millimeter size?
Is your regular brand of cigarettes menthol or non-menthol? (Check Quota)
What is your regular brand of cigarettes -- that is, the brand you smoke most often?
questions.instructions: HAND RESPONDENT BRAND LIST AND POINT OUT THE SECTION IN WHICH THEIR BRAND IS LISTED. THEN SAY: Which one of these is the specific type of BRAND cigarettes that you smoke most often?
questions.record: RECORD THE FULL BRAND NAME AND THE LETTERS WHICH FOLLOW THE BRAND EXACTLY AS PRINTED ON THE BRAND LIST.
questions.note: IF QUOTA IS FILLED OR IF NO LETTERS APPEAR

questions.question: During the past 6 months, have you been interviewed on the subject of cigarettes?
